case_title: ABDULLAH BUTT vs S. H. MUZAFFAR ZAIDI

complaint_details.complainant_position: Machine Operator at United Bank Ltd., Abpara Branch, Islamabad
complaint_details.complaint_against: S. H. Muzaffar Zaidi, Executive Vice-President, United Bank Ltd., Rawalpindi Zone
complaint_details.allegations: Scooter provided for trade union activities was taken back to force complainant to quit the union.

witnesses.name: Rashid Malik
witnesses.position: Sub-Accountant, Agriculture Development Bank of Pakistan, Islamabad
witnesses.statement_summary: No personal knowledge; only heard complainant's claim.

witnesses.name: S. Mumtaz
witnesses.position: Teller, State Bank of Pakistan, Islamabad
witnesses.statement_summary: No personal knowledge; only heard complainant's claim.

prosecution_evidence.complainant_statement: Failed to prove scooter was provided for trade union activities; no supporting records or examples presented.

key_findings: No evidence proving scooter was provided for trade union activities.
Withdrawal of facility does not constitute unfair labor practice under Section 15(f) of the I.R.O.
No demand or settlement involved between union and management.
